# 知乎问答：为华为工作几年之后华为会卸磨杀驴是真的吗？

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-wei-huawei-gongzuo-jinian-zhihou-huawei-hui-xiemoshalv-shi-zhende-ma
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-wei-huawei-gongzuo-jinian-zhihou-huawei-hui-xiemoshalv-shi-zhende-ma
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhihu-wenda-wei-huawei-gongzuo-jinian-zhihou-huawei-hui-xiemoshalv-shi-zhende-ma
zhihu-wenda-wei-huawei-gongzuo-jinian-zhihou-huawei-hui-xiemoshalv-shi-zhende-ma <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhihu-wenda-wei-huawei-gongzuo-jinian-zhihou-huawei-hui-xiemoshalv-shi-zhende-ma
zhihu-wenda-wei-huawei-gongzuo-jinian-zhihou-huawei-hui-xiemoshalv-shi-zhende-ma <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
